about_the_game:
The world is no longer the same. Humans turn into terrifying creatures due to a mysterious disease. Monster battles await you in dangerous areas where you have to prove your skills. Do you have the courage and the will to survive to embark on this adventure? Fight your way through hordes of mutants and arm yourself with powerful weapons. Monster mayhem!

Dangerous areas await you in which you have to face hordes of mutants. You should familiarize yourself with your surroundings and definitely keep an eye out for equipment. Anything that gets in your way must be shot down. Don't be squeamish because any second could be your last!

In this game you can expect:

  • Level with varied themes: city, forest, desert
  • Fight against different types of monsters
  • Firearms and melee weapons: sniper, pistol, uzi, shotgun, axes, clubs, bows, crossbows
  • Monster mayhem

content_descriptors.notes: Mad Massacre Includes violence, blood and gore involving  dangerous creatures (for example: zombies, monsters, soldiers).

  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
